segment.source: How to View and Configure Applications and Default Virtual Application Extensions by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to View and Configure Applications and Default Virtual Application Extensions by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to View and Configure Applications and Default Virtual Application Extensions by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to View and Configure Applications and Default Virtual Application Extensions by Using the Management Console

segment.source: How to View and Configure Applications and Default Virtual Application Extensions by Using the Management Console
segment.target: How to View and Configure Applications and Default Virtual Application Extensions by Using the Management Console

segment.source: Use the following procedure to view and configure default package extensions.
segment.target: Use the following procedure to view and configure default package extensions.

segment.source: To view and configure default virtual application extensions
segment.target: To view and configure default virtual application extensions

segment.source: To view the package that you want to configure, open the App-V 5.1 Management Console.
segment.target: To view the package that you want to configure, open the App-V 5.1 Management Console.

segment.source: Select the package that you want to configure, right-click the package name and select edit default configuration.
segment.target: Select the package that you want to configure, right-click the package name and select edit default configuration.

segment.source: To view the applications contained in the specified package, in the Default Configuration pane, click Applications.
segment.target: To view the applications contained in the specified package, in the Default Configuration pane, click Applications.

segment.source: To view the shortcuts for that package, click Shortcuts.
segment.target: To view the shortcuts for that package, click Shortcuts.

segment.source: To view the file type associations for that package, click File Types.
segment.target: To view the file type associations for that package, click File Types.

segment.source: To enable the application extensions, select ENABLE.
segment.target: To enable the application extensions, select ENABLE.

segment.source: To enable shortcuts, select ENABLE SHORTCUTS.
segment.target: To enable shortcuts, select ENABLE SHORTCUTS.

segment.source: To add a new shortcut for the selected application, right-click the application in the SHORTCUTS pane and select Add new shortcut.
segment.target: To add a new shortcut for the selected application, right-click the application in the SHORTCUTS pane and select Add new shortcut.

segment.source: To remove a shortcut, right-click the application in the SHORTCUTS pane and select Remove Shortcut.
segment.target: To remove a shortcut, right-click the application in the SHORTCUTS pane and select Remove Shortcut.

segment.source: To edit an existing shortcut, right-click the application and select Edit Shortcut.
segment.target: To edit an existing shortcut, right-click the application and select Edit Shortcut.

segment.source: To view any other application extensions, click Advanced and click Export Configuration.
segment.target: To view any other application extensions, click Advanced and click Export Configuration.

segment.source: Type in a filename and click Save.
segment.target: Type in a filename and click Save.

segment.source: You can view all application extensions associated with the package using the configuration file.
segment.target: You can view all application extensions associated with the package using the configuration file.

segment.source: To edit other application extensions, modify the configuration file and click Import and Overwrite this Configuration.
segment.target: To edit other application extensions, modify the configuration file and click Import and Overwrite this Configuration.

segment.source: Select the modified file and click Open.
segment.target: Select the modified file and click Open.

segment.source: In the dialog box, click Overwrite to complete the process.
segment.target: In the dialog box, click Overwrite to complete the process.

segment.target: Got a suggestion for App-V?
